changelog.md.Pour rappel s'il n'y a pas d'information: As a reminder, if there is no information on the update, it means that it only concerns the update of documentation, translation or text
changelog.md.correction de l'erreur (The stream or fi: fixed error (The stream or file "/var/www/html/core/class/../../log/" could not be opened in append mode
changelog.md.Nouveau module pour le hotspot avec dhcp: New module for hotspot with dhcp
changelog.md.Ajout LiXee-GSM dans les regles usb (deb: Addition of LiXee-GSM to the USB rules (unplug then reconnect the equipment to see it with the new USB link
changelog.md.Nouvelle interface pour le plugin mobile: New interface for the mobile plugin
changelog.md.Fixer une adresse ip (Wifi et Ethernet: Set an IP address (Wifi and Ethernet
changelog.md.Changement du scenario du bouton Aliment: Changing the scenario of the Power button on the back of the box
changelog.md.Mise à jour LTE pour erreur de demande L: LTE update for LTE request error while box not compatible
changelog.md.Patch done fonction (clignotement de la: Patch done function (flashing of the green led of the box solved
changelog.md.Ajout de la fonction LTE pour les boxs a: Added LTE function for boxes with LTE option
changelog.md.Ajout de la fonction LORA pour les box a: Addition of the LORA function for boxes with LORA option
changelog.md.Ajout des usb Fixe (ttyUSBLUNA-Zigbee a: Addition of Fixed usb (ttyUSBLUNA-Zigbee to use dnas the Zigbee plugin to no longer have to worry about usb changing
changelog.md.Activation Lora pour les Luna avec Lora: Lora activation for Luna with integrated Lora (Pro
changelog.md.Fix souci de Localhost sur la box: Fix Localhost issue on the box
changelog.md.Fix Batterie Luna (gestion de l'arrêt de: Fix Luna Battery (management of Linux shutdown as well as the battery in the system

index.md.depuis le 27\/03\/2023 nouvelle image Je: since 03/27/2023 new image Jeedom Luna (known as V2
index.md.Vous pouvez faire une maj sans perte de: You can make an update without loss of backup etc by clicking on "Update Recovery module
index.md.cela redémarrera votre Jeedom Luna mais: this will restart your Jeedom Luna but you will not lose your configurations
index.md.Cela fera des changements dans le module: This will make changes to the recovery and boot module of the box which will allow better stability of the box
index.md.Nous avons eu un retour sur une erreur d: We received feedback on an error in flashing certain Jeedom Luna boxes
index.md.Nous sommes désolé pour ceci et avons pr: We are sorry for this and have informed our Domadoo reseller
index.md.Si vous arrivez à vous connecter à votre: If you manage to connect to your Jeedom, please launch the Luna plugin (Plugins/Home automation gateway/luna) and go to
index.md.Cela mettra a jour votre Box complètemen: This will update your Box completely
index.md.Si vous n'avez pas d'accès à votre box,: If you do not have access to your box, please keep the reset button on the box pressed for more than 10 seconds; when the latter is released, the box should flash
index.md.Vous pourrez faire la procedure ci-dessu: You can do the above procedure for a complete update
index.md.Veuillez contacter Domadoo via le lien s: Please contact Domadoo via the following link; the Domadoo team will provide you with a return label and send you a correctly flashed Luna
index.md.Les fonctionnalités du plugin Luna: The features of the Luna plugin
index.md.Dans la version du plugin Luna du 02\/05: In the Luna plugin version of 02/05/2023, the Zigbee port has been fixed, you must use the ttyUSBLUNA-Zigbee port
index.md.Pour les usb externes, cela ce fixe auss: For external USBs, this is also fixed automatically with the name and or serial number
index.md.La mise à jour permet de mettre la derni: The update brings the latest image into place on the Luna; it will use this image during a recovery (reset button on the box or recovery button on the plugin
index.md.Cliquer sur le bouton recovery; la Luna: Click on the recovery button; the Luna will download the latest version of its image and reboot, the green LEDs on the Luna case will flash
index.md.local>; le logiciel de recovery sera à j: local>; the recovery software will be up to date
index.md.Lors d'un reset factory la box est rétab: During a factory reset the box is restored to factory configuration according to the updated image via the button given above
index.md.Il faut faire un backup de votre box ava: You must make a backup of your box before this operation because you will lose the data from your box (except the backup on the SD card
index.md.Vous pouvez via la commande de type sele: You can via the select type command change the color and animation of the led (can be turned off
index.md.Vous pouvez, via deux retours d'informat: You can, via two pieces of feedback, have the battery percentage as well as the type of power supply of your box
index.md.Permet la gestion (formatage) de la cart: Allows the management (formatting) of the micro-SD card that you can add to the box, as well as the transfer to this SD card of Jeedom backups
index.md.Les boutons Alimentation et Reset (v1) P: Power and Reset buttons (v1) Luna plugin not up to date
index.md.moins de 1 seconde pour un reboot forcé: less than 1 second for a forced reboot of the box
index.md.plus de 10 secondes pour un Reset Factor: more than 10 seconds for a Factory Reset of the box
index.md.plus de 10 secondes pour un arrêt de la: more than 10 seconds for a forced shutdown of the Fox with battery shutdown (you must first remove the power supply to do this
index.md.Les boutons Alimentation et Reset (v2 no: Power and Reset buttons (v2 new image
index.md.moins de 1 seconde pour un redémarrage m: less than 1 second for a hardware restart of the Luna box
index.md.entre 1 et 4 secondes pour un arrêt ou a: between 1 and 4 seconds for the battery to turn off or on (Orange = off, Green = On
index.md.entre 5 et 9 secondes redémarrage de la: between 5 and 9 seconds restart of the box (blue flashing when released
index.md.entre 10 et 20 secondes pour un arrêt de: between 10 and 20 seconds for the box to stop (orange flashing when released
index.md.plus de 30 secondes pour Reset Factory d: more than 30 seconds to Reset Factory of the box (red flashing when released
index.md.Lora (uniquement pour les boxs Jeedom Lu: Lora (only for Jeedom Luna boxes sold with the Jeedom Lora module
index.md.Détection automatique du module et lance: Automatic detection of the module and launch of the packet forwarder, on the localhost of the jeedom
index.md.Utiliser le plugin LNS pour installation: Use the LNS plugin to install the application; nothing needs to be done from the Luna plugin, everything is automatic
index.md.possibilité de le désactiver dans la par: possibility of deactivating it in the LTE part
index.md.Dans la partie Wifi du plugin vous pouve: In the Wifi part of the plugin you can check the Hotspot box which will allow you to create a wifi access point on your Box luna
index.md.DNS et forwarding IP (pont entre Etherne: DNS and IP forwarding (bridge between ethernet and wifi) functional on it
index.md.vous pouvez dans la page Ethernet ou wif: you can in the ethernet or wifi page of the luna plugin set the ip addresses of it, to set the ethernet you must first have an activated wifi connection
index.md.Vous pouvez dans la page d'accueil du pl: In the home page of the plugin you can prioritize the connections so that the box switches from Ethernet to wifi if there is no connection or vice versa
index.md.Le plugin luna vous permet de vous conne: The luna plugin allows you to connect from your luna to a Wifi network (with or without a password
index.md.Pour ce faire, aller dans le plugin luna: To do this, go to the luna plugin, then select the Luna equipment
index.md.A cet endroit vous pouvez activer puis s: Here you can activate and then select the wifi you want (2
index.md.4Ghz et 5Ghz), puis taper le mot de pass: 4Ghz and 5Ghz), then type the password and save
index.md.Pour le moment, le plugin prend en compt: For the moment, the plugin only takes into account access with DHCP
index.md.Détection automatique de la 4G interne à: Automatic detection of 4G internal to the box
index.md.Merci de bien vouloir passer par le plug: Please go through the Luna plugin and click on 'Detect LTE module' Request pin code and APN in the LTE page of the Luna plugin
index.md.si 4G détectée, lancement d'un module de: if 4G detected, launch of a connection module in the background which automatically switches from Ethernet or wifi to 4G if necessary
index.md.Le plugin SMS fonctionne en meme temps q: The SMS plugin works at the same time as 4G on the Luna 4G
index.md.Les paramétrages se font dans la page LT: The settings are made in the LTE page of the plugin
